unit.cpp:define: #define MyMem12Cpy(dest, src, num) { UInt32 *d = (UInt32 *)dest; const UInt32 *z = (const UInt32 *)src; UInt32 n = num; do { d[0] = z[0]; d[1] = z[1]; d[2] = z[2]; z += 3; d += 3; } while (--n); }
